PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-11791997-08-280,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
PrecisAMENDMENT TO a DESIGNATION whereby the COLUMBIA LAKE, the LOWER KOOTENAY, the SHUSWAP, the ST. MARY'S and the TOBACCO PLAINS BANDS surrender, for a term of 99 years, any of their rights and interests in some 130.2 hectares of land on St. Mary's Indian Reserve No. 1A in British Columbia, for leasing purposes (P.C. 1996-1792), to include a GAMING ESTABLISHMENT as one of the commercial uses.
Attachments
precis:
AMENDMENT TO a DESIGNATION whereby the COLUMBIA LAKE, the LOWER KOOTENAY,
the SHUSWAP, the ST. MARY'S and the TOBACCO PLAINS BANDS surrender, for a
term of 99 years, any of their rights and interests in some 130.2 hectares
of land on St. Mary's Indian Reserve No. 1A in British Columbia, for
leasing purposes (P.C. 1996-1792), to include a GAMING ESTABLISHMENT as
one of the commercial uses.
